explains: v. 使疏离（alienate 的过去式）

sentences.en: He had alienated many people with his tactless remarks.
sentences.cn: 他说话没轻没重，疏远了许多人。

sentences.en: The party is struggling to win back voters who have been alienated by recent scandals.
sentences.cn: 这个政党正尽力把最近因丑闻而疏远的选民争取回来。

sentences.en: His comments have alienated a lot of young voters.
sentences.cn: 他的言论使许多年轻选民离他而去。
